page.title: 16SCHOOL GAMES IN CHELTENHAM
page.content: {Netball.}We like to play netball.You have two teams and two goal posts.You also have a ball.The object of the game is to get the ball through the top of the goal posts.The team that scores the most goals are the winners. The goal posts have a circle at the top that is joined onto a pole which is on a stand. {Football.}Football also has goal posts but they are different because they are put together in an oblong shape.It is usually played by boys or men.They have to kick the ball to another player in the team,who tries to kick the ball in the goal.The winners are the team who have scored the most goals. { Hopscotch.}In hopscotch there are numbers drawn on the floor up to ten. You throw a stone on a number then you hop up and down and pick up the stone.
